comments.comment: Jandipathi thumani mama 226 denaama gedara yavanna owna kiyana mathaye sitina kenek. Namuth ape mahajana kemeththa matha oba janadipathi thanathurata path una. Aththatama harima sathtui oba thumage veda pirivela. Oba thuma me prathipathi idiriyata tath gena yai kiya balaporoththu vemu. Mahajana thava oba thuma kerehi loku visheshayak thibba. Koi paksha yeth sitinava kisima vedakata nethi pirisa. Owun va sathutu karanavaata vadaa ahinsaka duppath minisun sathutu karanna gotabaya mahathuni. Evita obage rajaya digu kal venjabenu atha. Oba thumata theruvan saranin ape aluth rajaye veda karagena yaamata siyalu shakthiya lebevaai prarthana karami.
comments.author: sanda fernando

comments.comment:
Rajaye niladari inne mahajanathwata sewaya karanna nanuth kisima rajjaya ayathanayak eka hariyata siddawenne ne..suluwen hari..eya kriyathmaka wenam e pasalak pamanai..lekam karyala. Thepal karyala..ewagema  rajaye hospital walanam ......kiyanna kanagatui.....ahinsaka minisun dukwidina tharam...hariyata sewayayk laganna beriwa....ithin janapathi thumai meyata wahama kriya maragayak ganna..hariyata rajaye sewaya nokarana ayata...nithimaya peththen.....sudusu daduwamak labadennata katauthu karanna....
    Nethnam hemadamath ahinsaka asarana minisun dukwidinawa...
